Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: Sparse, dry shrubbery covers the dusty ground as far as the eye can see. A wagon trail leads through the center of the flat desolate land to a raised rocky form on the horizon with a smattering, continuous stream of smoke rising from behind it. The sky is a hazy green color, presumably from the strange stream of smoke.
A dusty, desolate wagon trail through a flatelands.
A dusty, desolate wagon trail through the flatlands.
northern end of the wagon trail
The northern end of the dusty wagon trail seems so very far away.
The northern end of the dusty wagon trail seems so very far away.
A rocky cliff like formation rises abruptly from the otherwise completely flat land upon the distant horizon. A smattering trail of smoke continuously rises from its seemingly circular shape.
A rocky cliff like formation rises abruptly from the otherwise completely flat land upon the distant horizon.
In the far distant horizon a rocky, cliff like formation rises abruptly from the ground and towards the sky. A smattering trail of smoke continuously rises from its seemingly circular shape.
In the far distant horizon a rocky, cliff like formation rises abruptly from the ground and towards the sky. A smattering trail of smoke continuously rises from its seemingly circular shape.
The sky in this area is a hazy green color which seems to be caused by the odd smoke rising out of the distant rocky formation.
The sky in this area is a hazy green color which seems to be caused by the odd smoke rising out of the distant rocky formation.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{Lingering patches of fog lazily float over the visible skyline, fleetingly dimming areas of the path in shadow.\|An eagle screeches its majestic cry as it swoops overhead in search of food.\|A frigid breeze rushes through the path, creating an eery howl as the wind rushes past you.\|Something small skitters in the patches of greenery causing tiny pebbles to scatter down the cliff.\|A sudden gust of wind kicks up dust particles that seem to aim specifically for your eyes.\|A sudden, harsh gust of wind sends sharp icy flurries raining down on you at a swift speed.\|To and fro, the wind seems to be indecisive along in this channel as the falling flakes of snow seem to dance on the breeze.\}
